ca_certificate.description: Path to the server's SSL CA certificate

insecure.description: Whether to verify the server's SSL certificate

addattr.description: Add an attribute/value pair. Format is attr=value. The attribute must be part of the schema.

setattr.description: Set an attribute to a name/value pair. Format is attr=value.

exclusiveregex.description: Regex expression for values that should be excluded.

inclusiveregex.description: Regex expression for values that should be included.

set_identifier.description: Unique identifier to differentiate records with routing policies from one another

type.description: The record type (A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, PTR, SRV, TXT, SSHP)

allow_inline_dnssec_signing.description: Allow inline DNSSEC signing of records in the zone

allow_prt_sync.description: Allow synchronization of forward (A, AAAA) and reverse (PTR) records in the zone

allow_query.description: Semicolon separated list of IP addresses or networks which are allowed to issue queries

allow_transfer.description: Semicolon separated list of IP addresses or networks which are allowed to transfer the zone

computed_zone_name.description: Real zone name compatible with ARPA (ie: `domain.tld.`)

default_ttl.description: Time to live for records without explicit TTL definition

nsec3param_record.description: NSEC3PARAM record for zone in format: hash_algorithm flags iterations salt

skip_nameserver_check.description: Force DNS zone creation even if nameserver is not resolvable

skip_overlap_check.description: Force DNS zone creation even if it will overlap with an existing zone

soa_minimum.description: How long should negative responses be cached

ttl.description: Time to live for records at zone apex

zone_forwarders.description: Per-zone forwarders. A custom port can be specified for each forwarder using a standard format IP_ADDRESS port PORT

addattr.description: Add an attribute/value pair. Format is attr=value. The attribute must be part of the schema.

external.description: Allow adding external non-IPA members from trusted domains

gid_number.description: GID (use this option to set it manually)

setattr.description: Set an attribute to a name/value pair. Format is attr=value.

hostcategory.description: Host category the hbac policy is applied to (allowed value: all)

servicecategory.description: Service category the hbac policy is applied to (allowed value: all)

usercategory.description: User category the hbac policy is applied to (allowed value: all)

host.description: **deprecated** Host to add to the HBAC policy

hostgroup.description: **deprecated** Hostgroup to add to the HBAC policy

hostgroups.description: List of hostgroups to add to the HBAC policy

hosts.description: List of hosts to add to the HBAC policy

identifier.description: Unique identifier to differentiate multiple HBAC policy host membership resources on the same HBAC policy. Manadatory for using hosts/hostgroups configurations.

block.description: FreeIPA HBAC policy host membership resource

identifier.description: Unique identifier to differentiate multiple HBAC policy service membership resources on the same HBAC policy. Manadatory for using services/servicegroups configurations.

service.description: **deprecated** Service name the policy is applied t

servicegroup.description: **deprecated** Service group name the policy is applied to

servicegroups.description: List of service group name the policy is applied to

services.description: List of service name the policy is applied t

block.description: FreeIPA HBAC policy service membership resource

group.description: **deprecated** User group to add to the HBAC policy

groups.description: List of user groups to add to the HBAC policy

identifier.description: Unique identifier to differentiate multiple HBAC policy user membership resources on the same HBAC policy. Manadatory for using users/groups configurations.

user.description: **deprecated** User FDQN the policy is applied to

users.description: List of user FQDNs to add to the HBAC policy

block.description: FreeIPA HBAC policy host membership resource

force.description: Skip host's DNS check (A/AAAA) before adding it

generated_password.description: Generated random password created at host creation

krb_auth_indicators.description: Defines a whitelist for Authentication Indicators. Use 'otp' to allow OTP-based 2FA authentications. Use 'radius' to allow RADIUS-based 2FA authentications. Other values may be used for custom configurations.

krb_preauth.description: Pre-authentication is required for the service

mac_addresses.description: Hardware MAC address(es) on this host

random_password.description: Generate a random password to be used in bulk enrollment

trusted_for_delegation.description: Client credentials may be delegated to the service

trusted_to_auth_as_delegate.description: The service is allowed to authenticate on behalf of a client

userclass.description: Host category (semantics placed on this attribute are for local interpretation)

host.description: **deprecated** Host to add. Will be replaced by hosts.

hostgroup.description: **deprecated** Hostgroup to add. Will be replaced by hostgroups.

hostgroups.description: Hostgroups to add as hostgroup members

hosts.description: Hosts to add as hostgroup members

identifier.description: Unique identifier to differentiate multiple hostgroup membership resources on the same hostgroup. Manadatory for using hosts/hostgroups configurations.

name.description: Absolute path of the sudo command
Name of the sudo command group

identifier.description: Unique identifier to differentiate multiple sudo command group membership resources on the same sudo command group. Manadatory for using sudocmds configurations.

name.description: Name of the sudo command group

sudocmd.description: **deprecated** Sudo command to add as a member

sudocmds.description: List of sudo command to add as a member

runasgroupcategory.description: Run as group category the sudo rule is applied to (allowed value: all)

runasusercategory.description: Run as user category the sudo rule is applied to (allowed value: all)

usercategory.description: User category the sudo rule is applied to (allowed value: all)

sudocmd_group.description: **deprecated** Sudo command group to allow by the sudo rule

sudocmds.description: List of Sudo command to allow by the sudo rule

option.description: Sudo option to add to the sudo rule.

identifier.description: Unique identifier to differentiate multiple sudo rule runasgroup membership resources on the same sudo rule. Manadatory for using runasgroups configurations.
